name: Horatio and the Temple of Time & Space
summary: A short puzzle-platformer about manipulating your surroundings with various spells. Made with Unity.

name: Liar's Dice for Discord
summary: A fully implemented Discord Bot that allows users to play Liar's Dice with each other through an embed-based GUI. Made with Discord.py

name: Fiery Waters
summary: A song that mixes electronic and orchestral elements to create a beautiful soundscape imitating a sunrise. Made with Ableton Live 12.

name: Sound Design for "The Robbing"
summary: Mixing, Mastering, and SFX for a short LEGO® animation about a bank robbery.

name: Metathesiophobia
summary: A first-person 3D horror game about escaping from a lab while avoiding a raging monster.

name: Laz√Ür
summary: A top-down tile-based puzzle game set in a futuristic lab. Made with PuzzleScript.

name: Spook Skoop
summary: A Halloween themed Catch 'Em-style game. Made with Unity.

name: This Portfolio!
summary: My very own portfolio website, implemented entirely from scratch with HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Insomnia
summary: A piano duet inspired by Brahms Hungarian Dance No. 5 that falls deeper into madness as it continues.

name: Caged Bird
summary: A text-based adventure game about escaping from a Prisoner-of-War camp in Cold War Era Russia. Made with Twine.
